name: Winlogon AllowMultipleTSSessions Enable
description: Detects when the 'AllowMultipleTSSessions' value is enabled. Which allows for multiple Remote Desktop connection sessions to be opened at once. This is often used by attacker as a way to connect to an RDP session without disconnecting the other users
false_positives: Legitmate use of the multi session functionality
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Winlogon\\AllowMultipleTSSessions AND winlog.event_data.Details:*DWORD\ \(0x00000001\))`
